name: The HoneyTrap [DEMO]
description:
Currently in development!!!

After years of scrimping and saving, Miel, an Omega, finally succeeded in opening a small cafe of his very own, but his beloved shop is barely on its feet, when it is destroyed by the invading Alpha force. Remembering the face of the Alpha that destroyed his shop, Miel swore he’d get his revenge if he ever encountered the Alpha again. Months later, the war between the Alpha Force and the Resistance has reached a tenuous armistice. Miel is working as a delivery boy when he lays eyes on the Alpha he’d sworn vengeance against.

Bär, an Alpha soldier and Captain of the esteemed Berserker Brigade, believed he had his life all planned out with a long long career in the military, but an unforeseen injury jeopardized all of that. Now, out of commission, he is - unhappily and unwillingly - put on medical leave in an idyllic countryside village where he is to watch for detractors and members of the Resistance until he is again fit for battle.

Miel’s reencounter with the soldier brings back all of his resentment and anger, so he decides to get his revenge. But what happens when he gets caught in his own honey trap?

Team Credits:

Art and Narrative Design by Dahl

Writing and Narrative Design by Hazum

Music by Rosko

Social Media Marketing by Jen

Release: Demo ("early ver.")
